Brutal Charge

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, gnoll, ferocious charge racial power, Fierce Charge
Benefit: When you use your ferocious charge power, you can choose to make an encounter melee attack power instead of a melee basic attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 367, page(s) 54.
